reviews.comments:
La casa de Carlos es tal cual se ve en las fotos, ideal para dos personas. Está equipada para tener una estadía cómoda. Carlos es muy atento y puntual.
El baño es un poco chico. 
Volvería sin dudas.
reviews.response: Gracias por tu comentario Ivana. Cuando quieras volver te recibiremos con mucho gusto. Saludos!

reviews.comments: La comunicación con Carlos y Facundo fue fluida, rapidos para contestar mis inquietudes. La entrada y salida fue sin ningun inconveniente. El depto tiene todo lo necesario, el cuarto es muy grande, todo muy limpio. La zona es tranquila. Agradecida con Carlos y Facundo!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Melanie. Un placer haber sido tu anfitrion. Saludos!

reviews.comments: Estuvimos muy cómodos, no faltó nada y el depto está muy bien equipado, incluso tiene plancha!
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias por tu comentario Alejandra. Ojala nos les haya complicado mucho la confusion que tuvieron con PM y AM. Seguire tu sugerencia especificando en el futuro que 12 PM es mediodia.  Saludos!
Carlos

reviews.comments:
El departamento de Carlos está muy bien ubicado!!! Es un lugar cálido, limpio e ideal para pasar una linda estadía en Mendoza!!
La comunicación muy fluida!!! Anfitrión muy atento!!!
Volvería sin duda!!!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario. Sera un placer recibirlos cuando vuelvan a Mendoza!! Saludos!

reviews.comments: El depto se Carlos es tal cual se muestra en las fotos. La cocina si bien no tiene horno, es completa y se puede hacer alguna comida sin problemas. El baño es tal vez lo más incómodo ya que es muy chiquito. La zona donde esta ubicado es muy accesible, tiene comercios cerca para comprar víveres y otras necesidades. Se puede acceder a pie al centro sin ningún problema. Carlos y facundo se mostraron siempre predispuestos y no tuvimos ningún inconveniente al respecto. Sin dudas lo recomiendo.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario y por recomendarnos.  Saludos!!

reviews.comments: Excelente ubicación, excelente atencion, ideal para aquellas personas que deseen parar en la zona céntrica cerca de todo y alejados del ruido. Muy recomendable
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Santiago. Que bueno que estuvieron comodos. Saludos!

reviews.comments: El depto esta ubicado en una zona hiper tranquila y muy linda. La atención de Carlos y Facundo fue increible, re mil atentos y amables. Es muy lindo el departamento, impecable.  Desde ya que vamos a volver. Mil gracias por todo!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Chuli. Me alegra que hayan estado comodas. Sera un gusto volver a recibirlas cuando vuelvas a Mendoza. Saludos!

reviews.comments: Muy recomendable. Céntrico, limpio y cómodo. Amplio criterio para el check in y el check out.
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias por tu comentario Fernando.
Muy buena observacion la de la llave adicional. La vamos a implementar para futuros huespedes que la necesiten. Saludos! Carlos.

reviews.comments: Ubicación y limpieza
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario David!

reviews.comments: Fue una excelente experiencia. Carlos y facundo han sido sumamente amables, hicieron todo para que la estancia en mendoza sea fabulosa. Absolutamente recomendada.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Pablo. Un placer haber sido su anfitrion. Saludos!

reviews.comments:
Muy buena ubicación, el departamento era tal cual lo publicado.
Todo muy cómodo excepto la ducha que tenia una mampara muy pequeña y el termo tanque se regeneraba muy despacio.
reviews.response: Gracias por tu comentario Guillermo.  Saludos! Carlos

reviews.comments: El departamento superó las expectativas. Me sorprendió lo limpio, equipado, y con la ubicación perfecta! Es muy lindo y super acogedor. Carlos y Facundo unos anfitriones de primera! Sin dudas volveremos!!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Carolina. Me alegra mucho que hayan estado comodos y lo hayan pasado muy bien. Sera un placer volver a ser su anfitrion!

reviews.comments: Carlos se contacto conmigo al instante de la reserva y me hizo llegar toda la información necesaria. Facundo y Fransisco fueron muy amables y atentos a la hora de recibirnos. Check in y check out muy flexibles. El departamento está muy bien ubicado y es tal cual muestran las fotos. Fuimos con clima fresco y la calefacción funcionó muy bien!!! Lo recomiendo. Hermoso Mendoza!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por el comentario Gianfranco. Me alegra que lo hayan pasado bien. Saludos!

reviews.comments: Super recomendable!
reviews.response: Gracias por tu comentario. Saludos!

reviews.comments:
Todo tal cómo está publicado, Facundo, el mánager del depto, se portó de diez con nosotros, incluso antes de que lleguemos.
Totalmente recomendable.
reviews.response: Patricio, muchas gracias por tu comentario. Saludos!! Carlos

reviews.comments: Departamento nuevo y totalmente equipado aunque poco luminoso. La ubicación es buena. Pequeño problema eléctrico con la luz del baño que no impidió el normal uso del mismo.
Hermoso dpto! Súper recomendable
reviews.response:
Carla, muchas gracias por el comentario! Me alegra que les haya gustado el departamento. 
Saludos!. 
Carlos.

reviews.comments: Todo tal cual las fotos. Estuvimos muy comodos. Gracias y saludos
reviews.response: Gracias por tu comentario. Saludos!

reviews.comments: Bien equipado tiene todo lo necesario para una estancia cómoda, con muebles nuevos y bien ubicado a 4 cuadras del centro.
reviews.response: Gracias por tu comentario Sebastian. Saludos!

reviews.comments: Tal cual el anuncio. Muy moderno y cómodo para una pareja.
reviews.response:
Sandra, muchas gracias por tu comentario y sugerencias.
Saludos.
Carlos

reviews.comments: Genial todo , excelente ubicación y mucha comodidad. Super recomendable
reviews.response: Gracias por tu comentario Luu. Que bueno que estuvo todo muy bien. Saludos!

reviews.comments: Muy buena estadía y buena recepeción por parte de Carlos, el depto muy bien ubicado, no faltó nada, muy completo. Recomendable 100%.-
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Oscar! Saludos! Carlos.

reviews.comments: Todo tal cual lo descrito, muchas gracias por todo, cocina superequipada, lugar propio para estacionar, muy buena ubicación, muy bien el Wi-Fi. Todo positivo

Queremos expresar nuestro agradecimiento Francisco por la muy buena predisposición, quien nos recibió y nos brindo  una cordial bienvenida.  Nos sentimos muy bien en el Dpto.   
Estuvo de acuerdo a lo publicado por internet.
El mismo esta situado a  cuadras de la zona céntrica de la ciudad.
reviews.response: Alberto, muchas gracias por tu comentario. Me alegra mucho que se hayan sentido muy bien en mi departamento. Gracias por la sugerencia respecto a la TV. Saludos!. Carlos.

reviews.comments: Excelente ubicación, el lugar es exactamente igual a las fotografías y Carlos estuvo disponible en todo momento. Con respecto al equipamiento, tenía más cosas de las que pensábamos y si duda volveríamos a ir. Hermosa la cuidad de Mendoza, super recomendable!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Mauricio. Me alegra que hayan estado comodos y hayan disfrutado su visita a Mendoza. Saludos! Carlos.

reviews.comments:
Departamento remodelado y muy bien equipado. 
Cerca del centro, nos manejamos todo caminando.
A mi gusto muy poca luz natural al estar en planta baja.
Recomiendo.
reviews.response: Gracias por tu comentarios Romina. Saludos!

reviews.comments: Excelente el lugar y sobre todo la atención por parte del propietario y administradores.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Gustavo. Saludos!

reviews.comments:
El departamento está muy bien ubicado, en el centro de la ciudad y es de fácil acceso. 
El espacio es confortable pese a que el baño es un poco reducido y está tal cual como se lo presenta en el anuncio.
Muy recomendable
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Santiago. Me alegra que hayan estado comodos y lo hayan pasado bien en Mendoza. Saludos. Carlos.

reviews.comments:
EL departamento es como indican las fotos y la descripción.
Fuimos en época de frío y realmente la calefacción funcionó muy bien, así como el agua caliente.
La ubicación es buena, cerca del centro histórico, de los sitios turísticos y de la terminal de buses.
El único inconveniente que tuvimos fue que el inodoro no funcionaba muy bien.
Carlos estuvo siempre a nuestra disposición.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Lujan. Que bueno que funciono todo muy bien. Ya resolvimos el tema del inodoro. Saludos. Carlos.

reviews.comments: El departamento es tal cual como se en las fotos. Muy limpio y excelente ubicacion. La comunicacion con Carlos fue excelente. Recomendable.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Dan!. Un gusto ser su anfitrión. Saludos!. Carlos.

reviews.comments: Todo perfecto. Departamento muy lindo bien ubicado con todas las necesidades para estar comodo. Gracias
reviews.response: Gracias por el review Hernan! Saludos

reviews.comments:
El Departamento era muy lindo y nuevo bien ubicado y tranquilo solo habia un problemita con el agua de la pileta de la cocina y del baño que iban a solucionar este miercoles 
La ducha andaba perfecta 
La ubicación barbara a 4 cuadras de la Av San Martin y a 5 de la peatonal Sarmiento
Todo resultó muy bien. El departamento es cómodo, bien ubicado y funcional. Cumplió mis espectativas en mi viaje de negocios. La comunicación fue excelente.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Claudio!. Saludos. Carlos.

reviews.comments: Departamento muy cómodo, a pasos del centro y con las comodidades basicas para una buena estadía.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Carlos. Que bueno que estuviste comodo. Saludos!

reviews.comments: Excelente lugar, limpio y acogedor , muy bien ubicado permite recorrer a pie muchos lugares , locales comerciales y de comida bastante cercanos, excelente lugar.

La descripción del departamento es tal cual, cerca del centro, lugar y tranquilo, a 15 o 20, minutos del aeropuerto (dependiendo el tráfico). Nuestro anfitrión muy paciente debido al retraso del vuelo, cordial y respetuoso. Ambos muy oportunos para responder a nuestras dudas. Carlos se preocupo de dejarnos por escrito los detalles como números de emergencia,wifi,  policial, transfer,  etc. Siempre muy dispuesto a hacer de nuestra estadía un momento agradable. Ademas el departamento contó con todo lo necesario para realizar nuestras comidas.
reviews.response: Me alegra mucho que hayan estado comodos y lo hayan pasado muy bien. Muchas gracias por el comentario. Sera un gusto volver a recibirlos cuando vuelvan por Mendoza. Saludos!

reviews.comments: Tenía todo lo necesario en el departamento.
reviews.response: Gracias por tu comentario. Saludos! Carlos

reviews.comments: Departamanto cómodo y funcional para un viaje de negocios. La comunicación con Carlos y Facundo fue excelente.
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias por tu comentario Claudio!. 
Saludos. 
Carlos.

reviews.comments:
El departamento está muy bien equipado y con lo necesario para una buena estadía. La ubicación es otro punto a destacar pues queda cerca de todo y en un punto intermedio si andas en auto.

Te agradecemos que el departamento posea wifi, pues salvo en algunos espacios del mall, la ciudad no posee zonas 

Te felicito por el servicio y en especial a Facundo, quien siempre estuvo presto para atender nuestras inquietudes y dudas.
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias por tu comentario Pedro. Me alegra que hayan estado comodos y lo hayan pasado muy bien.
Un fuerte abrazo.
Carlos

reviews.comments: El departamento de Carlos es genial. Está ubicado en el centro de Mendoza, cerca de todo. Tienes 2 aires acondicionados frío calor lo cual es bárbaro si vas , como en mi caso en época de frío. Carlos es una persona súper atenta que tiene el departamento en perfecto estado para cuando llegas. 100% recomendable.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Marcelo. me alegra que hayan estado comodos. Saludos! Carlos

reviews.comments:
El departamento es muy lindo y con lo necesario para la estadia.
Se encuentra cercano a minimarkets y a 2 cuadras de un supermercado, por tanto es comodo en cuanto a cercania a comercio y al centro.
Nos fascino todo todo!!! tal cual las fotografias :D!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario Patricia. Me alegra que hayan estado comodos. Saludos!

reviews.comments: El departamento es tal cual se observa en las fotos. Es lindo,limpio, cómodo, ubicado cerca de la av. San Martin (centro) en un edificio tranquilo. Fuimos en auto por lo que hicimos uso de la cochera. Nos encantó la estadía, muy buena recepción y atención.
reviews.response: Gracias por tu comentario Estefania. Que bueno que estuvieron comodos y lo pasaron muy bien. Saludos! Carlos

reviews.comments:
El departamento esta conforme a mas fotos y a la description, con todo lo necesario para cocinar y sentirse bien. El Barrio es centrico y es facil visitar la Ciudad a pie. Ademas tuvimos algunos problemas y el amigo de Carlos que se occupa de departamento nos ha ayudado mucho. 
Gracias !
reviews.response: Hola Esther, muchas gracias por tu review. Me alegra que lo hayan pasado bien a pesar del problema que tuvieron durante su paseo por la ciudad. Saludos. Carlos.

reviews.comments: Lamentablemente un paro en la frontera, impidio mi arrivo. Pero la coordinacion y comunicacion entre Carlos, Airbn y este servidor a sido exelente.

El departamento estuvo exactamente como decía el aviso y mejor! Todo nuevo y en perfectas condiciones. Nos esperaron en la entrada del edificio con las llaves y fueron muy amables.  Definitivamente valió la pena quedarse aquí y lo volvería a hacer!! Muchas gracias!!!

El departamento está precioso, muy bien cuidado y con todas las comodidades necesarias para una buena estadía. La ubicación es perfecta ya que esta muy cerca del centro y del terminal de buses por ende son distancias caminables. Los anfitriones Facundo y Daniel fueron muy agradables y siempre preocupados por nuestra comodidad.

The apartment itself was just as described. It's cozy, clean and close to downtown. It takes about 10-15 minutes to walk to Plaza Independencia. It's on the first floor of a street that is not that busy at night. The bedroom is actually facing the other side of the street so at night with the bedroom door closed, I heard no street traffic, which was nice. There is heat/air conditioning in all rooms. 

What made it the ideal experience was Facundo, the apartment manager. My flight from Buenos Aires was delayed, so he went out of his way to get a bottle of wine for me so I had something to drink when I arrived after stores had closed. He even gave me a ride in his car to my hotel after I checked out. He was always available for advice about restaurants, etc. and he made me feel at ease.

This place is perfect for 1 or 2 People, on a quiet street right next to a lovely park where you can relax in the evening sun. Right around the corner from bus stops that can take you to the airport or Maipú for example. Also a short walk from an excellent supermarket, a little further, about 25 minutes, are the main streets for food and drinks - some lovely bars and restaurants. The apartment was clean and stylish with some superb aircon which made no noise at all when on unlike lots of places we’ve stayed! Carlos was responsive and even checked in via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) after a heavy rainstorm one night! All in all, great.
reviews.response: Thank you for this beautiful and detailed review!. Glad you enjoyed staying at my apartment. You will be very welcome in the future. Saludos!! Carlos.

reviews.comments: Carlos' place was fantastic!  It is a spacious, clean, very comfortable apartment in a great location close to shops and restaurants.  The local host was very, very helpful and communication was excellent!  There are lots of amenities including a toaster, microwave, electric kettle, air conditioning, a TV, etc.  Another great feature of Carlos' apartment were the information sheets he provided listing things like emergency numbers and wifi information.  My wife and I would highly recommend Carlos' place to anyone travelling to Mendoza.
reviews.response:
Thanks a lot for your generous review. Knowing that you were confortable at my apartment makes me very happy. It'll be a pleasure to be your host again if you visit Mendoza in the future. 
Best!
Carlos

reviews.comments: This apartment is OK if you plan to be out and about most of the time as we were. It is a ground level apartment with minimal natural light. The hot water cylinder is small, so we needed to take very quick showers before it ran cold. Good location - just a few blocks from the center. We probably could have found something a little nicer for the same price and wouldn't choose to stay here again.
Good apartment. Centrally located, clean, good host. Only note: hot water doesn't last for more than 5 minutes. Also, overall cold temperature in the apartment.
reviews.response:
Hi Sophi.
Thanks for your comment.
My apartment has two Cod/Heat air conditioners installed. May be you didn't realize that they could be used as heaters.
And yes, because of the dimensions of the property the boiler is small. We should have told you that the trick in winter is to administer the hot water by opening in half and mixing it with cold water. This way it lasts longer. Sorry about that.
Best !
Carlos

reviews.comments: Localização excelente, cozinha, quarto e sala ótimos mas banheiro muito pequeno!
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias por tu omentario y por el feedback!
Saludos!
Carlos

reviews.comments: Fomos super bem atendidos por Carlos e Facundo. Boa localização, ótimo custo-benefício.
Localização ótima. Apartamento ótimo. Anfitrião otimo. Excelente custo beneficio. Parabéns
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu comentario! Saludos

reviews.comments:
Great central apartment to explore Mendoza! Lovely little self contained flat with all the essentials.

Communication and check-in was easy, and well priced for the money.

Highly recommended!
reviews.response: Thank you very much for your comment! Glad you enjoyed your stay.

reviews.comments:
Bei Carlos war es super. Die Kommunikation war schnell, einfach und hatte alles was es braucht.

Die Unterkunft liegt neben einem Hotel was es für Tourenanbieter einfach macht einen einzusammeln.
Es gab supermarkt etc. Im Umkreis sowie ist man schnell in der Stadt.

Ansonsten fand ich es sehr gemütlich und voll ausgestattet. Lediglich ein Ofen fehlt. 

was für ins uns sehr wichtig war, war der Parkplatz direkt am Haus und das hat auch alles super geklappt.

Carlos Unterkunft kann ich gut und gerne empfehlen.
reviews.response:
Annemarie, 
Thanks for you review.
Glad you were confortable.
Saludos!

reviews.comments: Limpo, ótima localização, adoramos!
reviews.response:
Thanks for your review!
Saludos.

reviews.comments: The apartment was a good size for me and the bed was comfortable.
reviews.response: Thank you very much for your review. Saludos!

reviews.comments: Great location, clean, spacious and comfortable apartment. The price is perfect for the features of the apartment, I would definitely stay here again next time I am in Mendoza.

Carlos was very easy to deal with.  Helpfully he let us check-in early and check out late.  Is perfect if you're getting the bus in or out of Mendoza as is only 10 mins walk from the bus station.  There is a huge hotel next door, so we used that as our pick up point for a couple of tours.
reviews.response: Hi Tim, thanks a lot for your review and suggestions. I reslly appreciate them. Saludos! Carlos

reviews.comments: Logement conforme à la description. TRÈS proche du centre. TRÈS propre. Un peu sombre mais c était indiqué dans la description. LE seul problème est le lit d appoint pour la personne supplémentaire qui n est pas du tout confortable. Très disponibles pour les horaires d entrée et de sortie. LO pasamos muy bien.

All communication with Carlos was prompt. The apartment is spacious and comfortable.  The shower had plenty of hot water and good water pressure.  The bathroom is small but adequate.  We did not meet Carlos but his manager, Facundo, was very friendly and helpful and was on time for check-in and check-out.  The apartment is easy walking to the town centre.  We enjoyed our stay very much.  The wifi worked well.  Thank you Carlos and Facundo.
reviews.response: Glad you were comfortable and enjoyed your stay. Thanks for your review!

reviews.comments: We had an overall great stay at this apartment. Carlos was responsive and quite helpful, sending us a thorough guide for the apartment and things to do in Mendoza. He is actually not on site, and he has an apartment manager who was also available and reliable. The apartment is spacious, has all the amenities and is well located if you want to avoid driving into downtown to see all the interest points and go to restaurants. We had a minor issue with the toilet flush, but Carlos was prompt about it and is getting it fixed in a timely fashion, so it should not be an issue. Overall, good experience and good host.
reviews.response: Glad you had a great stay in Mendoza. Thank you for your review! Best.

reviews.comments: Well equipped apartment in a good location. It's near to the bus station an within 10 minutes walk you are at Plaza Independencia. Facundo, the host who helps you to check in and out, is very nice and correct. Great value for the price!

Apartamento confortável para 2, quarto bem espaçoso. Aquecedores funcionam bem. Toalhas e lençóis limpos, mas o chão estava bem empoeirado. A localização é meio estranha à noite, o apartamento fica no térreo e as fechaduras da porta são um tanto antigas, dando sensação de insegurança. Anfitrião sempre disposto a ajudar, super acessível! O preço é justo mas precisa melhorar esses detalhes.

Facundo (works w/Carlos) was there waiting my arrival and ensured that I settled into the apartment, very cosy one bedroomed unit that was very clean and tidy. Located right next to the MOD Hotel, I was able to walk easily to city center. Cab stand right around the corner made longer journeys to great restaurants very easy.
reviews.response:
Hi James, 
Glad you had a nice stay at Mendoza. Thanks for your review.!
Best
Carlos.

reviews.comments: Carlos's apartment was very nice and conveniently located. It is a very short walk from the central squares with nearby bus stops.

I choose Carlos' apartment based on the positive reviews and description, and all can say is both are very accurate. I stayed here with my wife and our new born baby for 8 nights. The apartment is very comfortable and central and we had a lovely stay. This was our first time using Airbnb, so it was very pleasing it worked so smoothly. Carlos was very responsive and really easy to deal with in the email exchanges we had with him. Facundo and his father, who manage the property, are lovely and very helpful.  When we needed them, they were very helpful in answering queries we had about tourist activities. We speak Spanish but their English is excellent and a real bonus.  They were also very flexible to accommodate our check in and check out times, which was very much appreciated. We would definitely stay again, if we come back to Mendoza. So thanks Carlos and Facundo
reviews.response: I'm glad you enjoyed your stay in Mendoza and my apartment. Thanks a lot for taking the time to review us. Best! Carlos.

reviews.comments: What a lovely apartment! I stayed here with a friend of mine whilst we were taking a Spanish course in Mendoza. It was really easily accessible, clean, comfortable and was everything we had hoped for! I would thoroughly recommend staying here. Furthermore, Carlos was very forthcoming and pleasant to deal with and Facundo and his Dad who manage the flat, were the nicest people ever! On the two instances that we needed them, they came over staight away to sort the problem. It was perfect for two people, but could have fit four as there are two double beds (one in the bedroom and a large futon). Thanks Carlos!
reviews.response: Julia: Your are very welcome. Glad you liked my apartment and it was everything you hoped for. It was really a pleasure to be your host. Best always!

reviews.comments: My partner and I had a great week staying in Carlos' apartment in Mendoza. We spent a week studying Spanish and it was great for us to have our own place to come back to everyday. The location was perfect - only 15 minute walk to our school and just 10 minutes up to the Main Street with all the shops. Facundo was very helpful when we arrived and was on hand for us to ask any questions during our stay. They were also very flexible with our check in and out times which was great. We'd highly recommend staying here.
reviews.response: Glad you had a great stay in my apartment and was well located for your activities. Thanks for your kind review!. Best. Carlos.

reviews.comments: O próprio Carlos nos recebeu. O apartamento muito bem localizado tanto para sair para as bodegas quanto para circular a pé pela cidade. Estava completo e com tudo funcionando. Tivemos que fazer check out às 4 horas da manhã e novamente estava lá o Carlos com a sua simpatia. O Apartamento foi melhor do que esperávamos.

Carlos, Facundo, and his dad are awesome and very responsive. The apartment is okay. We are nomad entrepreneurs who work during the day. This apartment isn't ideal for long-term stays, but it would have been great if we'd stayed just a few days as tourists and used the place mostly for sleeping. So if that's you, it's recommendable. We had a reservation for 26 nights, and we stayed for 20 nights and then we went to the Park Hyatt for the last 6 nights because we had grown quite uncomfortable. There is paper on the front window for privacy, but it also makes the place feel like a cave instead of a productive work environment. The building is old, the shower is extremely small, but the hot water works great; so does the water pressure. Make sure to remove hair from the drain after each person showers because it gets clogged very quickly. I appreciated the toaster and the air conditioner. The bed is not very comfortable, the sheets and pillows are very thin, and I could not tell if the comforter had been washed. We had some major issues getting our Apple devices to connect to the internet during the first few days, but I figured out the issue by googling the name of the modem and logging into it. Not even the internet company could figure it out; it turned out to be a setting that was causing our devices to be flagged and blocked. As you can see I have mixed feelings about this place. It just wasn't right for us, but it could be perfect for someone else.
reviews.response:
Thank for your feedback Caitlin. 
I had 36 guests before you and I must say none of them was as demanding as you. 
We met almost all your requests but I see that was not enough.
-I apologize for the shower drain issue.
-Nobody has complained before about bed and pillows.
-You are the first guest having serious wifi connectivity issues. We upgraded the internet speed just for you. I'm glad you finally found out what was no working properly on your computers.
I agree with what you mention about staying and working here for a long period of time. It's a small apartment designed for tourists. I did not know you planned to stay working inside every day.

reviews.comments: This apartment was as described with a very easy check-in process. Facundo, Carlos' property manager, was polite and easy to communicate with throughout our stay. We were able to walk or take a short cab ride to many places from this convenient location. Every excursion that we booked was easy to arrange as this property is next door to a large hotel. Our only concern was that the apartment was not up to our expectation.

Exatamente como as fotos mostram...o apartamento proporciona uma estadia confortável! A localização é ótima...próximo ao centro da cidade, o que facilita a locomoção! Facundo, o administrador, é muito atencioso e pontual! Carlos é muito atencioso e rápido nas respostas, o que facilita muito a comunicação!!Carlos e Facundo nos deixaram fazer check-in antecipado sem maiores problemas, o que nos ajudou muito!! Muito obrigada! Recomendamos certamente!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tus comentarios y sugerencias! Saludos

reviews.comments: Apartamento limpo, super bem localizado, foi tudo muito bom, tivemos facilidade em comunicação, foram tiradas todas as nossas dúvidas antes da chegada, apartamento localizado próximo ao centro da cidade, perfeito para casais, não tivemos nenhum problema .

We enjoyed our staying in Mendoza, it's a quiet and small city and its really nice to walk around the main squares and taste some fine wines. The apartment is well located and we were able to walk everywhere. The listing is as showed in the picture clean and cosy. Unfortunately the apt is located on the ground floor facing a street so is't a bit noisy and if you want some privacy you need to keep the courtains closed. We were welcomed by Facundo that is a very charming and nice host.

Apartamento bom, exatamente como nas fotos, com boa localização, ao lado de um grande hotel, próximo (15 min andando) a Plaza Independência e aos bons restaurantes da Sarmiento. Boas instalações, cozinha bem equipada, boa cama, tudo limpo e organizado. A internet funcionou perfeitamente bem. Facundo nos recebeu muito bem dando as instruções necessárias. Pontos negativos: tamanho do box/chuveiro do banheiro, é bem pequeno, um pouco apertado e o ralo estava entupido, bloqueando o escoamento da água, deixando empoçada a água dentro do box; atentem ao horário de checkin e checkout... É cobrada taxa de 100 pesos caso sejam realizadas fora do horário "correto", tivemos que pagar 200, 100 do checkin tardio e 100 do checkout mais cedo :( ... No geral recomendo o apartamento para hospedagem.

Apartamento bom! Prédio um pouco antigo e a garagem aberta para a rua.  Deve-se prestar a atenção para o check-in e check-out, se for fora do horário pré estabelecido você poderá ser taxado por isso, como nós fomos em 20 USD. Fomos atendidos pelo Facundo, ele foi bem atencioso e nos atendeu de prontidão!

My husband and I had a great experience with Carlos and his property manager, Facundo. Our planned road trip across the Andes from Chile was made impossible by a late season snow storm that shut the down the nearest mountain pass. Both Carlos and Facundo were very understanding and accommodating to our change of plans and request to come a few days later. Their quick communication was very much appreciated! The apartment itself is clean, quiet, and comes equipped with all the necessities. Great location as well, only a 10 minute walk to the main plazas, restaurants, etc. Highly recommend!
reviews.response: Glad you liked my apartment and enjoyed your stay. Thank you very much for your review!

reviews.comments: The apartment is as displayed, with a well equiped kitchen. It has heater/aircon in the living room and the sleeping room, which is handy. Internet is available but it's not always such a strong connection. The apartment is situated in a safe neighbourhood and it only takes about 10 minutes to the center. Facundo  (the apartment manager) and his father were helpful and friendly. Communication with Carlos and also Facundo was good.
reviews.response: Thanks for your nice review and comments. Best. Carlos

reviews.comments: The apartment had everything you needed and was exactly like the pictures, with a lovely spacious bedroom. Facundo, a relation to the property was there to meet us and checked in with us at the apartment a day later to see that we had everything we needed. The apartment is close to the center and is in walking distance to anywhere you would want to go.

We had a great stay in Mendoza and would certainly recommend Carlos's apartment for anyone looking for a great value spot in the city. Overall, the place is nicer and more spacious than it looks in the photos with high quality finishes and appliances. Carlos and his team in Mendoza took great care of us during our stay even helping us extend our visit when an illness prevented us from leaving on schedule.

Internet worked fairly well during our visit, showers were hot with decent water pressure, and there was limited street noise. It is a first floor apartment so there's not a ton of natural light, but we felt very safe and secure there. The location is good - about a 10-15 minute walk to the main square, but you should be aware that most restaurants and bars are a longer walk/bus/taxi in the opposite corner of town. 

All in all - Carlos's apartment is an exceptional value for Mendoza and I'd strongly recommend it for anyone looking for a clean, new, safe place to stay!
Séjour agréable.  Appartement conforme à la description sauf qu'il est au RDC et, par conséquent sombre. Nous n'avons pas vu Carlos mais avons été très bien accueilli par Facundo.

Carlo's place is very well equipped, comfortable and in a good location. I received and delivered the keys on the time scheduled and Facundo, who helps Carlos with the apt., was available through (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) all the time. The building has no concierge, but the neighborhood looks safe. I recommend the apartment.

Carlos and his people in Mendoza (Facundo and family) were nothing but helpful, welcoming and available to us during our stay. The apartment was recently remodeled, and it is well-equipped with appliances. It is a comfortable place for a couple. The bedroom is set away from the road, and it was a relatively quiet place to get some sleep considering the apartment is right downtown. 

Location of the apartment is really good if you are arriving or leaving by bus. It took us a little while to figure out the best route to the station, but it is only a ten minute walk on calm streets once you find the right path. The apartment is roughly in between the bus station and where most of the nice shops and restaurants are on Sarmiento.

My girlfriend and I are digital nomads, and Carlos had the internet hooked up especially for us before we arrived. The speed test I did resulted in 3 mbit per second download, 500 kbps upload and a 60 ms ping time. Browsing, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), screen sharing and Netflix all generally worked without problems, especially during the day. There was an odd tendency for the connection to get slow late at night (after midnight), but you should be out enjoying the bars and restaurants at that time anyway. :) I imagine that slowdown is universal to Mendoza and not a specific problem with this apartment. I had experienced similar time-specific slowdowns during our time in Buenos Aires previous to this stay.

Overall, nice apartment in a good spot hosted by good people. Would recommend.

Tudo correu perfeitamente bem.
O apartamento era exatamente como descrito.
Muito aconchegante e tudo funcionou bem.
A localização é muito boa. Não é perfeita, mas mesmo assim, muito boa.
Carlos foi muito atencioso e atendeu a todas as nossas expectativas.
Recomendo o lugar a qualquer casal que esteja interessado em passar alguns dias em Mendoza.

This was our first experience with airbnb and it was simply great! The apartment is totally new, clean and very cosy. The kitchen is excellent equipped (toaster, mixer, water boiler, microwave etc.) minimarket and restaurants are right around the corner, plaza independencia is reachable within minutes by walking. Carlos and his contact person from mendoza were extremely friendly and every time reachable by phone. We would recommend this apartment a 100%!

We had a wonderful experience staying at Carlos's apartment while we were in Mendoza. It is within easy walking distance of all the town's main attractions, yet located on a relatively quiet street, so not to be disturbed by heavy traffic at night.
The apartment was spotless, fully equipped,  and with cutlery, utensils, and towels that were seemingly brand new. It was ample in size, making its price an excellent value.
Carlos was flexible, prompt, and very accommodating.
We would not hesitate to recommend him to others, and hope to rent it again, were we to come back to Mendoza.
